translation:
The authorities mentioned in Article 47 of the Regulation of the State Collections, executed by Decree of August 14 of the past year, determine that henceforth all hides exported without a guide from the owners of the brands, in which they declare the sale to the exporter, or from Commanders of Army forces and Chiefs of Police of the Republic, with the signature of the Commanders of Brigades or Divisions, in the case of consumption, shall be seized, confiscated, and sold at public auction to the highest bidder in the Collection Office of the District where the seizure takes place.

The proceeds from the seized hides will be divided into two equal parts, one for the seizer or seizers, which will be delivered immediately, and the other for the National Treasury, as provided in Article 42 of the aforementioned regulation: which shall be fulfilled.
